body_html:
I frankly don't currently see any benefits of exposing index (it's more verbose, only accept tensors as argument, it's a strict subset of indexing as only support advanced indexing), so I'd probably just hide it.

But let's see what the others think.

body:
I frankly don't currently see any benefits of exposing `index` (it's more verbose, only accept tensors as argument, it's a strict subset of indexing as only support advanced indexing), so I'd probably just hide it.

But let's see what the others think.
